title: Haier 256 l Frost Free Double Door Bottom Mount 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Brushline silver/Dazzel Steel, HEB-25TDS)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator Unit
Warranty Card
Egg Tray
Key
Ice Tray
product_specification.Other Power Features: stabilizer free function with a voltage range of (135V-290V)
product_specification.Installation & Demo:
Explain all the functionality of the product
Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer
Usage of the product
The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes
The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost. All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately
Preventive maintenance action to be taken
Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Haier
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (where the Premises is Kept) Conditions that do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.8-in-1 Convertible: This convertible refrigerator comes with 8 inbuilt adjustable cooling modes that lets you multiply your fridge space depending upon your usage requirement. This feature has been specially designed, keeping in mind the average Indian consumer's usage patterns.
product_description.Bottom Mounted Refrigerator: If you use your fridge more than your freezer compartment, a bottom mounted refrigerator like this one will offer you optimum convenience. It also gives you easy access to the vegetable box and reduces the bending of your back up to 90%.

review:
The fridge looks great & works perfectly fine. No complaints so far. Haier was very prompt with the installation/demo. So all in all a very good shopping experience.
I like the idea of the chiller tray being at the bottom. Makes a lot of sense.

thanks haier for providing a great demo.the demo guy was really good and humble,coming to product very much satisfied with the refrigerator and its features.

on time delivery and received product in good condition .
prompt response from Haier.
Good refrigerator. Great value for money. The chilling effect of the fridge is very good. Compared to my old refrigerator, this one is completely silent while running. Would easily recommended.

A good buy, bottom freezer is definitely a great and a convenient feature. its a good product for a couple only. You will need more space if you are more than 3 people in the family and in summers, as you would need more space for keeping bigger and more bottles. Bottle guard cannot hold a bottle bigger than 1L.
best for this price, 8 in 1 convertible all features works better design is just wow best one.

I am happy so far..delivery was on time, even the demo happened on the same day.. capacity is enough for 3-5 persons..convertible feature appears useful but I have not really tried that.. however experience with previous one tells me that this could be handy... "zhookha mana hai" design is cool for us since we both are taller... one can adjust bottles according to size by shifting shelves.. Icemaker could have been little less messier though..filling it with water will need a little get used to..I would suggest to go for this newer design than same old thing..

Flipkart is simply great and product meets expectations!

Me being regular customer of flipkart.. was ever worried how people can choose products like refrigerator, washing machine and othe large appliances through flipkart... i was at the guesture that buying madhe appliances through retail shops is only the best way.... after reading many reviews i took decision buying new fridge on flipkart.. below are observations
1. Excellent User interface for flipkart app users
2. Wide variety and mode...
READ MORE

Good design storage is comfortable and the finishing is quite good , got in big billion day offer so value for money is appreciated over all great fridge for 4-5 people in family
The Flipkart customer care wasn't helpful to know how about the installation demo after delivery of the product and the system is quite chaos so it will be great if they be more helpful , if you are a person who has always being purchased electronic from local store and got personal assistance from the shop , you won't appreciate the online system that much
but the deal on Flipkart is always great so definitely worth try , the freezer section doesn't have light inside it , delivery by ekart was quite good they were helpful to adjust the fridge at the specified place where you wanted it to be and the installation demo was before time given so happy with that

One day used. Spacious. Cooling and Haier assistant came well.

Flipkart delivery persons made a big mess. They came and told, my staircase is not big enough to take it up ( 2nd floor). When I insisted, they asked me to sign a paper which they are saying , it will make my replacement and warranty void (!!). I asked them to come next day, so that I will arrange some helpers.
I bought a measuring tape, and measured the narrowest part of my staircase ( the U turn, about which , they complained). It was 70cm. The widest part of the fridge is 61.5cm ( + 7cm for Packing).
The next day, they came by 8.30am and I could not arrange helpers by that time. They reminded me about helpers and they wont deliver upstairs. I had a heated chat with them and I measured the box with my tape ( widest was 67 including package). So I told them, to bring it up and once it is stuck somewhere they can place it at that point and leave. Only two of them ( they were three , and I offered some cash on first day . they denied). Surprisingly( for them), the space was enough to keep the box upwards and turn and slide through the narrowest gap and they reached in my kitchen with the box in less than 5 mins!. Since I was in hurry to handle my morning pressure, i didnt want to state my ultimate win on their face. Just smiled and waved.

Excellent masterpiece by Haier with world-class technology and with good initiative of convertible mode,which you never get in any other companies now a days and the idea of bottom mounted freezer is quite good.
The only bad thing I came across is Flipkart delivery,as a leading e-commerce you must concentrate on your third party courier service.
Otherwise you will be in great trouble very shortly.

The fridge looks great & works perfectly fine. No complaints so far. Haier was very prompt with the installation/demo. So all in all a very good shopping experience.
I like the idea of the chiller tray being at the bottom. Makes a lot of sense.

thanks haier for providing a great demo.the demo guy was really good and humble,coming to product very much satisfied with the refrigerator and its features.

on time delivery and received product in good condition .
prompt response from Haier.
Good refrigerator. Great value for money. The chilling effect of the fridge is very good. Compared to my old refrigerator, this one is completely silent while running. Would easily recommended.

A good buy, bottom freezer is definitely a great and a convenient feature. its a good product for a couple only. You will need more space if you are more than 3 people in the family and in summers, as you would need more space for keeping bigger and more bottles. Bottle guard cannot hold a bottle bigger than 1L.
best for this price, 8 in 1 convertible all features works better design is just wow best one.

Good the product deliveried by flipkart own delivery . No tips asked and brought without damage. Works well for last one month.
Pros
1. Convertible so far checked to change the temp and it works. Did not change anything on it other then temp settings.
2. Lower freezer and removable ice tray. Saves space when I do not want ice at all.
3. Good cooling overall.
4. Has wheels so easy to move.

Cons
1. No freezer light
2.No real handle, but handle craved out in the door.
3. This model is not listed in Haier website. But you can get the same specs model from haier but that is costly by 2 to 3 k in market. I went for filpkart one as they had easy emi option. Else I would not have.

Overall Good buy . Long term service ya reliability can't comment
Awesome experience with Flipkart we are happy with the services and products as well All the best Flipkart team 👍🏻

Really awesome product. Hats off to Haier for making such product. It's reverse structure allows more comfort compared to normal fridge while using. It's 8 in 1 convertible feature allows u to save more energy as well its capacity can be increased by using this feature. Price is in the same range as of normal fridge. Sound is almost no. I don't think any other fridge is available with such features at this price. Demo service was also good and timely. I got this deal on festive season. Last but not least thx to flipkart for proving this product at reasonable price. Handling & delivery of the product was safe and secure. The delivery person himself carried the entire fridge on his back and bring on the second floor. Too much thx to him also (sorry I didn't remember name). Lots of negative comments are flying regarding service of Gati courier. But their prompt service is something that should be praised. No issue. Yes delivery is little bit late (around 12-15 days) but this may be OK (the product is huge and of course handelling with too much care is not easy) as u are getting such product at the minimal pricing.
Order processed and delivered on time , installation was so fast and they even changed the damaged bottleguard instantly . So happy to buy from flipkart and Haeir you are one of the best support

Amazing product and great value for money.... only drawback Is that it has a normal compressor which makes more sound than the ones with advanced digital inverter compressor but it's lower price of Rs 16,500 as part of big billion days offer justifies it's features...it's competitor products of Samsung n other brands with similar features have their price starting from 20,000 and above.... convertible feature helps using the refrigerator efficiently and helps save power.. overall performance is mind blowing so buy it without hesitation..!
Good product. Best we can get in this price range. The convertible option is great. Ample storage space. If you don't want a freezer, it can be easily converted to refrigerator.

I wanted to wait a few days before I wrote a review and I must say that this fridge is just great. The exterior build quality is just too good and especially the doors are designed and built really well giving it that premium look and feel. Having the refrigerator section on top and the freezer section below makes a lot of sense and you dont have to bend and you have full visibility of all the items in the refrigerator. The quality of the interior glass and plastics are top notch.
The delivery by ekart was hassle free and they even I unboxed the fridge. The haier technician came by a few hours later and got the fridge installed and running. Overall a fantastic experience and a great product!!!

Haier provides best product quality at very reasonable rate. It is future brand and manufactured in India in Pune.
Forget LG and Samsung that cost 50 percent higher to Haier products. I am fully satisfied with haier in terms of quality, service, rate and technology. Keep it up. Just Great.
I'm writing review after 3 months. Im very much impressed with flipkart . They deliver on time and no damage.It came very safe, and fredge is awesome it don't make noise.Im Happy with Haier product

An average product ! The refrigerator is cooling more than what is required, within 6 months I have to call 3 times. It's better to go with Samsung or LG which has a better experience. Haier it's time you need to fix things and make a better product for the price you are changing. I am upset that why I purchased your product.

My suggestion is that please do not buy this product !
Excellent refrigerator... 👌good color, nice look, 👌 good product by haier and good service by flipkart 👌 👍👍thanks flipkart 🙏🙏

Product is good
Delivery is good
But one of the demo person is not good
When completed to company
The complaint person is good resolve problem as soon as possible
Overall its too good

Using it from a year now and it's working absolutely fine till date. I usually keep the freezer off and only use refrigerator. build quality of Ice cube box is not good and the spring came out after few uses.but it is a useless thing for me so I didn't care. light inside the refrigerator is very good and bright.
Freezer is cool even when we turn it off.
Also smell from freezer travels to refrigerator section .

Also power consumption & noise is very less compared to my 190L old whirlpool fridge.
Freezer can reach upto -22Deg c which is a great feature for storing fish.

I got it at 17500 rupees only.no stand is required and you can directly keep the refrigerator on your floor by adjusting the feet.
very good product. looking at now a days requirements it is ideal to have bottom mount fridge. this will reduce the back pain and easy access to your most need item on top fridge

for 2 person family its more then enough capacity, cooling is good its functionality of different modes are something which needed for working class families, small for 5 person family below that its enough. cooling is super fast, installation also on time and quick, i am happy with this product.
After 2 months of delivery I am writing this review that Haier 256L DD BMR is a pocket friendly awesome product and also have very satisfying performance. Thanks flipkart for such a product.
gud looking and really best at this price range.. great deal... thank you Flipkart for your awesome support.. thank you...

Firstly the product is of very good quality within this price range. Delivery and Demo given before the scheduled time which is very impressive. Convertable modes are also more than as compare to other refrigerators. This is the best product in this range for middle class family as well as family of 2-3 persons.
Great product. Absolutely loved this refrigerator and the delivery guys were very cooperative and helpful. Thanks flipkart and keep up the good work.
best one for medium size family... the convertible features is really amazing ... love the look as well

Very well satisfied with the flipkart and Haier, although person who came for demo was more of imbecile who didnt know of any mode of functions. if I would have been illiterate, then i could have never been able to understand these function by his demo. I read it in fridge panel and understood on my own..
Haier product excellent but demo staff must be clever unlike some imbecile sent to me...
Haier Fridge - very happy with the purchase. The installation was done the very next day and it has been working fine since then. Happy that I opted to buy this fridge.

Best refrigerator. Writing this review after using for 7 months. Great cooling effect in normal mode and also in Super freeze mode. Power consumption is less when using single compartment. Liked the touch panel controls and led display which feels premium. Refrigerator is very silent. Worth the money. Good delivery from flipkart.
Haier products are usaually very nice in quality. Using 2 Fridge and one AC. Both are working fine. After sale service is the best part of the deal. Have personal experience, it is best among all.

it's a good fridge with special convenience of bottom freezer. I didn't face any problem regarding sound or side walls getting heated. working like a charm. demo was quick..within 3 hours of delivery.
only drawback is it doesn't have sufficient racks in the door to keep bottles and other items. cramped space doesn't allow more than 1.25 ltr bottle.
overall very good experience in this price range
Nice refrigerator....... and thanks to flipkart for timely delivery...... the installation and demo was even prior to the date which was fixed while making order..... Thank you flipkart

Beautiful look and very good cooling at and facility that gives you 8 type control thats why its calling 8 in 1 refridgerator i like to advised this product because you can put and take any vegy and milk without geting down you can work staight best facility that you can make full refrigerator ice you can convert full in refrigerator thanx for making energy efficient also
Loved this refrigerator. Looks really beautiful and is very energy efficient. Love the different conversion modes, perfect for our need.Installation guy had good knowledge of the product.

Very good product . Best services from both Flipkart and Haier . Refrigerator has 8 in 1 mode and a very good mi com panel inside the fridge to convert settings. I recommend to buy this product. Latest model as manufactured in 2018 .

Awesome product.

Saw this in an offline store. Loved it and it didnt disappoint me. There is a black variant in this model which is fantastic looking. And it actually makes sense to have the freezer at the bottom. Simple yet effective idea :)
In hindi it's said.... " saste main mast " .... Best build quality, timely delivery by flipkart and installation. Ideal for the family of 4 person. The convertible feature is awesome.

Perfect and very good looking. Convertible options are worth the money as can be set as per need of cooling requirements. Super cool and super freeze option are added advantage when we need quick chill cooling during extreme summers. Also the compressor is very silent, no sound at all compared to my previous one which I had exchanged this with. Installation was even prompt within 3 hrs of delivery(just that I called Haier customer care from my end to schedule it without waiting for flipkart to arrange). Overall i am very satisfied with its performance and full paisa vasool purchase. Thanks Haier!!
Coming to delivery it was delivered within time n delivery man were very courteous and patiently delivered the product on 4th floor without any complaints or additional demands considering they also needed to carry back my old refrigerator down four floors..must say it was perfect delivery experience with total customer satisfaction..thanks flipkart!!

best product ever till date as we had purchased first tym any electronic product frm any online site. and service executive was also very helpful and friendly who provide proper knowledge of evry bit detail abut this product. thanks

Looks and feel amazing.. Very good LED display indicator and touch buttons to change settings and temp ... Doesn't even feel like if fridge is cooling but stuff inside are chilled (thanks to no smog/gas visible inside fridge, when opening the door).. Nearly no sound.. . Prompt delivery and installation... Thank you.. And the price is very reasonable.

Excellent product by Haier, most affordable convertible refrigerator in this price range. Gud build quality and lots of space inside. Being a bottom mounted model it provides excellent usability by giving most used shelfs at the top for easy access. Got it at excellent deal during offer for around 18k including all discounts n exchange of old fridge.
Prompt delivery by Flipkart and amazing service.
Just go for it eyes closed !!
perfect deal for this price range. go for it..
Product is good but It was worst experience with flipkart. Very bad experience with flipkart.
very Good product.

received before expected time,thanks to flipkart..regarding product - within this price range great options (8 in 1) available..compared to other brand depth of this refrigerator is low, except this all other features are good. perfect for 2-4 mems family.
Useless product, it stopped working after 2 months.

product is good but it was a bad experience with flipkart. coming to the product the deodorizer is not that great as I can smell food when I am opening th door. but prompt demo and installation by Haier.
Good product, delivery was also in good condition.
It is really a best product in market. I simply luv it. Just buy blindly. You will never find this in other brands.
